page.title: 13SCHOOLS AND SCHOOLING
page.content: This starts with the Pre-school playgroup which caters for 20-30, 3-5year olds and meets in the old Fourtowns P.S.,now a community hall. There are 3 {Primary Schools}today:- {1. Fourtowns P.S.Ahoghill,}built in 1962 to replace the old 2 room National School it has today 170 pupils in 6 classes, ranging as all primary schools do from 4 to 11 year olds. {2. Gracehill P.S.,}built originally as a Girls Boarding School as part of the Moravian Church village in 1760. This is a 5 room building,but since 1978 when Cambridge House Prep. closed it has 7 mobile classrooms for the 340 pupils in 11 classes. {3. St.Marys P.S.,}is a maintained Roman Catholic primary school built in 1970 beside the Chapel.It has 40 pupils in 2 classes at present.
